feed.title: Feishin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Feishin: 0.8.0
entry.content:
As always, thanks to contributors!

Highlights

  • (UI) Added alternative album header styling using blurred image (#717)
  • (UI) Added play countto album header (#720)
  • (UI) Fixed synchronization between playqueue rating/favorite values and detail pages (#707)
  • (UI) Fixed issue where in-page text could not be deselected if selected using keyboard shortcuts (#723)

What's Changed

  • Bump electron-updater from 4.6.5 to 6.3.0 in the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/687
  • Add play count to albums by @pyxfluff in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/720
  • Album blur, allow clicking the playerbar to toggle the player, misc changes by @pyxfluff in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/717
  • Bump electron-updater from 6.3.0 to 6.3.1 in the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/688
  • [qol]: adjust rules for user-select by @iiPythonx in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/723
  • [slightly less scuffed bugfix]: Update table rating/favorite when updated anywhere â€¦ by @kgarner7 in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/707

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/compare/v0.7.3...v0.8.0

entry.title: New release for Feishin: 0.8.1
entry.content:
Small fix.

Highlights

(UI) - Fixed issue where songs in the queue would be automatically skipped when viewing lyrics in the full-screen player

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/compare/v0.8.0...v0.8.1

entry.title: New release for Feishin: 0.9.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • (UI) Added visualizer to fullscreen player (web audio only) (#314)
  • (UI) Added context menu item to play items shuffled
  • (UI) Fixed issue where app could crash if duplicates rows existed in certain tables (#729)
  • (UI, Jellyfin) Fixed issue where image aspect ratio was not displaying correctly
  • (Desktop) Added setting to disable OS tray

What's Changed

  • [very rough draft]: add web visualizer by @kgarner7 in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/314

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/compare/v0.8.1...v0.9.0

entry.title: New release for Feishin: 0.10.0
entry.content:
Important for Navidrome: v0.10.0 removes support for Navidrome < v0.53.2 due to sort mappings changing in its API.

Subsonic support is finally here, thanks to @kgarner7! It has not been extensively tested, so please create issues for any bugs you find.

Highlights

  • (UI) Added Subsonic server support (#758) (Huge thanks to @kgarner7)
  • (UI) Added lyric translation with support for Azure and Google translator APIs (#732) (Thanks @DrENDzZ)
  • (UI) Fixed various date and timestamp formatting
  • (UI) Fixed layout shift when hovering the lyrics in the fullscreen player
  • (Player) Various fixes around queue shuffle behavior

What's Changed

  • [bugfix]: switch to UTC for release dates by @iiPythonx in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/743
  • Removed references to "ElectronReact" in MacOS menu bar by @jamie6king in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/756
  • Update Navidrome list sort mappings for ND v0.53.2 by @jeffvli in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/754
  • Lyrics Translation and Romaji (Fulfill #732) [Translation Part] by @DrENDzZ in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/747
  • Subsonic 2, general rework by @kgarner7 in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/758
  • Improved translations for English and Russian versions. by @Suoslex in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/760

New Contributors

  • @jamie6king made their first contribution in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/756
  • @DrENDzZ made their first contribution in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/747
  • @Suoslex made their first contribution in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/760

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/compare/v0.9.0...v0.10.0

entry.title: New release for Feishin: 0.10.1
entry.content:
Several fixes

Highlights

  • (UI) (Navidrome) Fix playlists longer than 300 tracks not loading
  • (UI) (Subsonic) Fix album list sort options for Year and Recently Played
  • (Docker) Fix SERVER_LOCK configuration when setting SERVER_TYPE to subsonic

What's Changed

  • point help menu items to feishin instead of just electron by @tcurdt in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/767

New Contributors

  • @tcurdt made their first contribution in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/767

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/compare/v0.10.0...v0.10.1
